articles.title: A pickup’s persistent plastic pan problems
articles.description:
John Paul, AAA Northeast's Car Doctor, answers a question from a reader frustrated by yet another leaking oil pan in their Ford truck.

The post A pickup’s persistent plastic pan problems appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: John Paul addresses oil pan leaks in Ford trucks, affecting local drivers.
Plastic oil pans are prone to leaks, causing frustration for Boston truck owners.
Residents may face increased repair costs and vehicle downtime due to this issue.

articles.title: Jaylen Brown scores 35 points in 26 minutes before watching Celtics coast to 136-107 win over Wizards
articles.description:
The Celtics took a 10-point lead into the half, led by 22 after three and opened a 33-point gap in the fourth despite resting Brown and other starters.

The post Jaylen Brown scores 35 points in 26 minutes before watching Celtics coast to 136-107 win over Wizards appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jaylen Brown scored 35 points in 26 minutes during the Celtics' victory over the Wizards.
Celtics led by 10 at halftime and extended the lead to 33 points in the fourth quarter.
This win boosts Celtics' confidence as they aim for a strong season start.
